remarks: Ordered pair membership in a composition.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-1997.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
opelco2g $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( <. A , B >. e. ( C o. D ) <-> E. x ( <. A , x >. e. D /\ <. x , B >. e. C ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
